Horncastle signed to [[Royalty Records]] in November 2013.{{cite news|title=Royalty Records Welcomes Tristan Horncastle!|url=http://royaltyrecords.ca/?p=5026|accessdate=September 11, 2014|work=[[Royalty Records]]|date=December 11, 2013}} His first single for the label, "A Little Bit of Alright", was released in January 2014.{{cite news|title=A Little Bit Of Alright, 1st Single Release Of 2014!|url=http://royaltyrecords.ca/?p=5063|accessdate=September 11, 2014|work=[[Royalty Records]]|date=January 6, 2014}} It peaked at number 34 on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Canada Country]] chart.
